snippet: OLNICK--Sylvia. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Sylvia Olnick, who together with her late husband Robert, demonstrated unparalleled generosity that has changed the course of countless lives. She leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Sylvia's children, Barbara and her husband Richard Lane, and Nancy and her husband Giorgio Spanu; her grandchildren; her great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: OLNICK--Sylvia. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Sylvia Olnick, who together with her late husband Robert, demonstrated unparalleled generosity that has changed the course of countless lives. She leaves behind a loving family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Sylvia's children, Barbara and her husband Richard Lane, and Nancy and her husband Giorgio Spanu; her grandchildren; her great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
